overview: On March 12, 2019, the "Portrait of Ferdinand VII of Spain" painting, painted by Goya in 1814, arrives from Santander to the Museum of Fine Arts of Asturias to remain in the same room for several months in front of another painting of his, "Portrait of Jovellanos, with the San Lorenzo arenal in the background" (1780-83).
title: A Spectre is Haunting [...]
